text: [Music]
why have you come to see me answer at
once I demand to know he was disturbing
my peace and for what deed
oh great all-knowing sage we need your
help too I know I know I'm after all the
all-knowing sage of the gray rock I
already know why you two are here I was
just asking to amuse myself and waste
some of your time but all-knowing sage
time is quite precious and if you know
why we're here my son if you move too
fast you might not see what's directly
in front of you sometimes a haste is
your biggest enemy you must learn to
slow down and see the truth right in
front of your eyes or whatever do you
mean
oh great surge it will take much more
than speed to accomplish what you wish
it will yes
it also takes perfect to strategy and a
keen sense of knowing yourself whoa wow
that blew my little dragon mind wide
open
